info.title: Instagram_Posts_Reels
info.description: Retrieve the list of posts and reels for an Instagram user.

get.description: Retrieve the list of posts and reels for an Instagram user.

can_reshare.description: Indicates if the post can be reshared.

can_save.description: Indicates if the post can be saved.

caption_is_edited.description: Indicates if the caption has been edited.

clips_tab_pinned_user_ids.description: IDs of users pinned in the clips tab.

comment_count.description: Number of comments on the post.

comment_inform_treatment.description: If the comment can inform treatment.

comment_likes_enabled.description: Indicates if likes on the comments are enabled.

comment_threading_enabled.description: Indicates if comment threading is enabled.

device_timestamp.description: Timestamp from the device when the post was created.

fb_like_count.description: Facebook likes count of the post.

fb_play_count.description: Facebook play count of the post.

fb_user_tags.description: User tags on Facebook associated with the post.

featured_products.description: List of featured products in the post.

filter_type.description: Type of filter applied to the post.

fundraiser_tag.description: Fundraiser tag associated with the post.

has_audio.description: Indicates if the user has liked the post.

has_liked.description: Indicates if the user has liked the post.

has_more_comments.description: Indicates if there are more comments to load.

has_privately_liked.description: Indicates if the post has been liked privately.

has_shared_to_fb.description: Indicates if the post has been shared to Facebook.

ig_media_sharing_disabled.description: Indicates if Instagram media sharing is disabled.

inline_composer_display_condition.description: Condition for displaying the inline composer.

inline_composer_imp_trigger_time.description: Trigger time for inline composer impression.

is_artist_pick.description: Indicates if the artist is picked.

is_auto_created.description: Indicates if the post was autocreated.

is_comments_gif_composer_enabled.description: Indicates if GIF composer is enabled for comments.

is_cutout_sticker_allowed.description: Indicates if cutout stickers are allowed.

is_in_profile_grid.description: Indicates if the post is in the profile grid.

is_open_to_public_submission.description: Indicates if the post is open to public submission.

is_organic_product_tagging_eligible.description: Indicates eligibility for organic product tagging.

is_paid_partnership.description: Indicates if the post is a paid partnership.

is_post_live_clips_media.description: Indicates if the post is live clips media.

is_quiet_post.description: Indicates if the post is a quiet post.

is_reshare_of_text_post_app_media_in_ig.description: Indicates if the post is a reshare of text post app media.

is_third_party_downloads_eligible.description: Indicates if third party downloads are eligible.

is_unified_video.description: Indicates if the post is a unified video.

is_video.description: Indicates if the post is a video.

like_and_view_counts_disabled.description: Indicates if like and view counts are disabled.

like_count.description: Number of likes on the post.

max_num_visible_preview_comments.description: Maximum number of visible preview comments.

media_appreciation_settings.description: Appreciation settings of the media item.

media_cropping_info.description: Cropping information of the media item.

mezql_token.description: MEZQL token associated with the post.

open_carousel_submission_state.description: Submission state of the open carousel.

original_height.description: Original height of the media item.

original_width.description: Original width of the media item.

play_count.description: Number of plays of the item.

product_type.description: Type of product in the post.

share_count.description: Number of shares of the item.

taken_at.description: Timestamp when the post was taken.

taken_at_ts.description: Timestamp when the post was taken in Unix format.
